thread.title: Aston Villa manager Tim Sherwood wanted Gayle or Adebayor to alleviate pressure on Jordan Ayew
thread.title_full: Aston Villa manager Tim Sherwood wanted Gayle or Adebayor to alleviate pressure on Jordan Ayew

title: Aston Villa manager Tim Sherwood wanted Gayle or Adebayor to alleviate pressure on Jordan Ayew
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 14:25 CET Aston Villa manager Tim Sherwood wanted Gayle or Adebayor to alleviate pressure on Jordan Ayew - www.ghanasoccernet.com Jordan Ayew 
Aston Villa manager Tim Sherwood wanted to bring in Crystal Palace's Dwight Gayle or Tottenham Hotspur's Emmanuel Adebayor in order to lift the pressure on summer signing Jordan Ayew, via the Birmingham Mail. 
Ayew signed for Villa over the summer from Lorient for a fee of Â£8.5 million (fee via the Mail report), but he has really struggled and is yet to score for his new club. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us YOU ALWAYS BRIGHTEN MY DAY LIKE THE MORNING SUNSHINE. DOES WHY I KEEP CALLING YOU MY SUNSHINE By: ALBERT TREBLA
